#include<cstdio>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long unsigned n,p,count=0,sum=0;
        scanf("%llu",&n);
        p=n;
        while(p>0)
        {
            sum+=p%10;
            p=p/10;
        }
        count=n*pow(2,sum);
        printf("%llu\n",count);
    }
    return 0;
}
